snippet.title: Subaeria - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Subaeria is an intense action puzzler with roguelike-elements where
players have to use their environment to defeat enemies. 

Players follow Styx, a young girl who’s out for revenge after her family is murdered by the overlord of Subaeria. As she progresses towards her goal of revenge, she’ll explore the underwater city of Subaeria to uncover the mysteries that lie below the depths.

Available on April 24th on Steam, Xbox One and PS4.
